about_the_game:
On a Galactic Railroad Night, You Catch a Glimpse of the Girls' Hell

On a Night on the Galactic Railroad, you will leave every time you find “true happiness.” ......

This is a visual novel game for you to know the brightness of life.

Synopsis

The main character, Sorataro, is waiting for the train at a station platform. He is living a gray life due to the shock of losing his girlfriend. He doesn't know the meaning of life and doesn't know what to do from now on. ......

Normally, he would take the train that comes at the appointed time and head off to college, but that day, for some reason, he suddenly thought about jumping onto the platform and dying - ending it all.

Then a girl in strange clothes appears next to him. At the same time, an old-fashioned train he had never seen before pulled up on the station platform.

Come on, let's get on this galactic train and go on a journey to find the real you.

Sola, following her invitation, boarded the train together with the girl,

There he catches a glimpse of the girls' hell. ......

Cast

CVs] Seiran: Rurugi Noguchi

Seiran: Ruriko Noguchi

Astera: Nakajima Yuki

Nerura: Tachika Tachibana

Lindow: Yua Miyuki

Amagawa: Yuui Otokura

Mirei: Yanagi

Recitativo: Akihiro Nagaoka

Aria: Kyui Otokura

Hatora: Mario Shoda

Tsuru: Kotono Tomo

Theme Song

Ginga Tetsudo wa Kiraboshi no Uchu” (The Galactic Railroad in the Kiraboshi Universe)

Song: ELISA

Arranged by TAKASUKE

Words: Kaoru Nekofuji

Ending Song

Chaldea Blooms in Hell

Song: Rinka Ryuyo

Composition and Arrangement: TAKASUKE

Words by Kaoru Nekofuji

Staff】 Planning・Character design・Scenario・Systems: Nekofuji Kaoru

Planning/Character Design/Scenario/System : Kaoru Nekofuji

Music : TAKASUKE

Production/Publisher：Sutajokaron

Translated with (free version)

content_descriptors.notes:
ヒロインのうち一人が、男性とラブホテルに行くシーンがあります。ですが、性行為の直接表現は存在しません。

There is a scene where one of the heroines goes to a love hotel with a man. However, there is no direct representation of sexual acts.
